## AnimationSet.createAnimation() method

Create and register a new animation clip.

**Signature:**

```typescript
createAnimation(name: string, embedded?: boolean): AnimationClip;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Unique name for the animation clip.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

embedded


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Whether the clip is embedded/owned (implementation-specific). Default false.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[AnimationClip](doc/markdown/./scene.animationclip.md)

The created clip, or null if the name is empty or not unique.
